ARABIC: يَٰيَحْيَىٰ خُذِ ٱلْكِتَٰبَ بِقُوَّةٍ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ ٱلْحُكْمَ صَبِيًّا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Yahya, take hold of the Book with vigour.' We gave him judgement while still a child,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: (We said:) "O John, hold fast to the Book;" and We gave him wisdom right from boyhood,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: O John! Hold the Book with all your strength." We had bestowed wisdom upon him while he was still a child;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We commanded John, Zachariah's son, to follow the guidance of the Lord with due steadfastness. To John We gave knowledge and wisdom to John during his childhood.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Yahya – hold the Book firmly”; and We gave him Prophethood in his infancy. (Prophet Yahya was only 2 years old at that time.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It was said to his son): "O Yahya! Hold fast to the Scripture." And We gave him wisdom while yet a child.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O Yahya! take hold of the Book with strength, and We granted him wisdom while yet a child
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O John, take the Book forcefully'; and We gave him judgment, yet a little child,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it was said unto his son): O John! Hold fast the Scripture. And we gave him wisdom when a child,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: To John We said, "Hold fast the Book," and while he was still a child, We bestowed upon him wisdom,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Yahya! se hold fast the book. And We vouchsafed unto him wisdom, while yet a child.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘O John!’ [We said,] ‘Hold on with power to the Book!’ And We gave him judgement while still a child,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (To his son came the command): "O Yahya! take hold of the Book with might": and We gave him Wisdom even as a youth,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It was said to his son): "O Yahya (John)! Hold fast the Scripture [the Taurat (Torah)]." And We gave him wisdom while yet a child.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (We said): 'O John, hold fast to the Book', and We bestowed on him judgment while yet a child
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “O John, hold on to the Scripture firmly,” and We gave him wisdom in his youth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah] said, "O John, take the Scripture with determination." And We gave him judgement [while yet] a boy
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [19:12] And two years after his birth, God, exalted be He, said to him: ‘O John! Hold on to the Scripture, namely, the Torah, firmly’, earnestly. And We gave him judgement, prophethood, while still a child, a three-year old;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (0 John!) Allah said to John when he reached the age of puberty and understanding: (Hold the Scripture) act according to that which is in the Torah, seriously and diligently. (And We gave him) and We gave John (wisdom) understanding and knowledge (when a child) when he was still young.
